About.heading: Hi! I m Rahul Lodhi
About.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in.

contactInfo.homeAddress: 7/1 NandPuri Kanker khera Meerut Cantt, U.P(250001)

Works.title: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control
Works.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text.
